##Booking by phone

You can call the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) to book your practical test by phone. You’ll need a:

- valid driving licence number
- credit or debit card (Delta, MasterCard, Visa or Visa Electron)
- theory test pass confirmation number

$C

**Driving Standards Agency (DSA)**  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1144  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

##Booking by post

To book your practical test by post, download the correct application form and send with the fee to DSA.

You can pay by cheque or postal order, but cash isn't accepted. 

###Tests for cars, mopeds and motorcycles, taxis, approved driving instructors (ADIs) and other specialist vehicles

$D

[Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ (PDF, 232KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_4013040.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ (PDF, 232KB)")

$D

###Tests for large goods vehicles (LGVs), passenger carrying vehicles (PCVs) and cars with large trailers

$D

[Download ‘Postal application for an LGV, PCV or car with large trailer practical driving test appointment’ (PDF, 123KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_4013041.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for an LGV, PCV or car with large trailer practical driving test appointment’ (PDF, 123KB)")

$D

$A

Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP 

$A

*[LGV]: Large Goods Vehicle
*[PCV]: Passenger Carrying Vehicle
introduction: You can book your practical driving test online here with no extra booking fee. You’ll need to have passed your theory test first.
more_information:
You’ll need your:

- valid driving licence number
- credit or debit card (Delta, MasterCard, Visa or Visa Electron)
- theory test pass date and confirmation number

You can book the following types of tests online:

- car
- moped and motorcycle
- lorry and large vehicle
- car and large trailer
- bus and coach
- taxi
- specialist vehicles, like tractor, road roller and tracked vehicle
- approved driving instructor (ADI) driving ability (part 2)
- ADI instructional ability (part 3)

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for DSA](/dsa-practical-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for DSA") before you start your booking.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
*[ADI]: Approved Driving Instructor
